@description.name: @description
@description.body: A table column model that automatically resizes columns based on a selected behavior.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The behavior to use. The provided behavior must extend {@link qx.ui.table.columnmodel.resizebehavior.Abstract} and implement the onAppear, onTableWidthChanged, onColumnWidthChanged and onVisibilityChangedmethods.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The owning object

@description.name: @description
@description.body: {String} The ID of the object.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Initializes the column model.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: numColumns {Integer} the number of columns the model should have.
@param.description: the number of columns the model should have.

@param.name: @param
@param.description: The table which this model is used for. This allows us access to other aspects of the table, as the behavior sees fit.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the table widget

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Reset the column widths to their "onappear" defaults.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: event {qx.event.type.Data} The "columnVisibilityMenuCreateEnd" event indicating that the menu is being generated. The data is a map containing properties table and menu.
@param.description: The "columnVisibilityMenuCreateEnd" event indicating that the menu is being generated. The data is a map containing properties table and menu.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for the "appear" event.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
event {qx.event.type.Event}
   The "onappear" event object.
@param.description: The "onappear" event object.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for the "tableWidthChanged" event.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
event {qx.event.type.Event}
   The "onwindowresize" event object.
@param.description: The "onwindowresize" event object.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for the "verticalScrollBarChanged" event.

@param.name: @param
@param.description:
The "verticalScrollBarChanged" event object.  The data is a boolean
   indicating whether a vertical scroll bar is now present.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for the "widthChanged" event.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
event {qx.event.type.Data}
   The "widthChanged" event object.
@param.description: The "widthChanged" event object.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for the "visibilityChanged" event.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
event {qx.event.type.Data}
   The "visibilityChanged" event object.
@param.description: The "visibilityChanged" event object.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a message Mark the message for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a plural message Mark the messages for translation. Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
@param.description: if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a message with translation hint Mark the messages for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: hint {String} hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.
@param.description: hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a plural message with translation hint Mark the messages for translation. Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: hint {String} hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.
@param.description: hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
@param.description: if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Mark the message for translation but return the original message.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} the message ID
@param.description: the message ID

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxObjectId. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property behavior. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #behavior}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property behavior. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #behavior}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property behavior. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #behavior}.
